name: Cosmic Quandary
summary:
Your goal in Cosmic Quandary is simple -- move the wizards so their spell paths avoid each other and obstacles on the board!
Puzzles are randomly generated so you'll never run out of unique challenges each time you play!
Play through 40 levels in Puzzle Mode to unlock new wizards, obstacles, enemies, game modes, and more! When you're ready, try your luck in Timed Mode to see how many puzzles you can complete before time runs out!
